title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Serial Killer
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A solo traveler who prides herself on reading people becomes the seventh victim of a charismatic fellow backpacker who has been using the hostel trail as his hunting ground.

death_teaser: Some people collect passport stamps. He collects something else.
